member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderMFOVTool.InputImageMaskOffsetYs
member.summary: Gets the collection of view mask y offsets used by this tool. Mask offset values are in pixel units.
member.remarks: This property defines the mask y offset for each view. That is, the offset from the top of the view image to the top of the view mask, in pixel units.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderMFOVTool.InputImageMaskOffsetXs
member.summary: Gets the collection of view mask x offsets used by this tool. Mask offset values are in pixel units.
member.remarks: This property defines the mask x offset for each view. That is, the offset from the left side of the view image to the left side of the view mask, in pixel units.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderMFOVTool.InputImageMasks
member.summary: Gets the collection of view masks used by this tool. View mask items can be null.

remarks.para: This property configures view input image pixels as "care" or "don't care". "Care" image pixels are processed normally. "Don't care" image pixels are not considered. Non-zero pixel values in the view mask translate to "care" in the view image. Zero pixel values translate to "don't care".
View mask pixels are aligned to view image pixels according to the view mask offset values.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderMFOVTool.Regions
member.summary: Gets the collection of view regions processed by this tool. View region items can be null.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderMFOVTool.InputImages
member.summary: Gets the collection of view input images processed by this tool.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderMFOVTool.NumFOV
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of views processed by this tool.
member.remarks: This property represents the number of views (i.e. image, region, mask sets) processed by the tool. That is, the size of the InputImages, Regions, InputImageMasks, InputImageMaskOffsetXs and InputImageMaskOffsetYs collections. Setting this property implicitly resizes the view collections to the new value. When NumFOV is increased new items are added to the end of their collections. And new item values are equal to the default item value, as specified in the following sections, for the particular collection.
member.value: The number of fields of view.

This class provides tool level access to the
operator.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderTool.InputImageMaskOffsetY
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y offset value in pixels.
member.remarks: The and InputImageMaskOffsetY values measure the offset from the upper-left corner of the InputImage to the upper-left corner of the , in image coordinates of the InputImage.
member.value: The y offset. The default is 0.

event.para: Fires when the value of this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderTool.InputImageMaskOffsetX
member.summary: Gets or sets the X offset value in pixels.
member.remarks:
The InputImageMaskOffsetX and
values measure the offset from the upper-left corner of the InputImage to the upper-left corner of the , in image coordinates of the InputImage.
member.value: The x offset. The default is 0.

event.para: Fires when the value of this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderTool.InputImageMask
member.summary: Gets or sets the InputImage mask. Non-zero pixel values indicate "care" and zero pixel values indicate "don't care".

remarks.para: A mask indicating areas of "Care" and "Don't Care". Pixels with nonzero values are interpreted as "Care" pixels: image pixels that correspond to "Care" pixels in the mask are treated normally. Pixels with zero values are interpreted as "Don't Care" pixels: image pixels that correspond to "Don't Care" pixels in the mask do not affect edge detection or coverage scores.

The mask is aligned to the input image using the
and
properties.

member.value: The default is a NULL image.

event.para: Fires when the value of this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderTool.Region
member.summary: Gets or sets the input image region, if any, to be processed by this tool.

member.summary: Gets or sets the input image to be processed by this tool.
member.exception: Raised when assign an image that is not of type .

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderToolBase`3
member.summary:
This class provides tool level access to the
operator. It is a VisionPro tool for MultiLineFinder functionality.
Performs line finding on the supplied images creating a CogMultiLineFinderMFOVResults object which contains the found results.
member.param: The images to process. Must contain one or more images and all images must be of type CogImage8Grey.
A collection of clip regions. A null collection means none of the images are clipped. A null collection item means the image at the corresponding index is not clipped.

A collection of masks. A null collection means none of the images are masked. A null collection item means the image at the corresponding index is not masked. Mask pixels having value zero are considered "don't care"; those having a nonzero value are considered "care".
A collection of mask x-offsets. Each x offset in imageMaskOffsetXs applies to the mask at the corresponding index in masks.
A collection of mask y-offsets. Each y offset in imageMaskOffsetYs applies to the mask at the corresponding index in masks.
member.remarks:
See
for information on how the clip regions will be applied to the images.
member.exception: is null, empty, or contains a null image.
The selected space of a clip region is not a valid space of the corresponding image.
One or more items are completely outside of the corresponding item.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.Execute(Cognex.VisionPro.ICogImage,Cognex.VisionPro.ICogRegion,Cognex.VisionPro.CogImage8Grey,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs line finding on the supplied image creating a CogMultiLineFinderResults object which contains the found results.
member.param: The input image to process. Must be a CogImage8Grey.
An optional . If supplied, only the pixels which lie within this region (subject to the value of ) will be considered. Supply null to process the entire image.
An optional . If supplied, mask pixels having a zero value are considered "don't care"; those having a nonzero value are considered "care".
The x offset used to align the pixels to the corresponding pixels.
The y offset used to align the pixels to the corresponding pixels.
member.exception: The selected space of is not a valid space in .

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.Assurance
member.summary: Gets or sets the degree of point selection rigor.
member.remarks:
This value equates to the likelihood that the best edge points will be selected, by the RANSAC algorithm, for line fitting. It only applies when
is set to RANSAC.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.LineFittingMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the combinatorics technique used to select edge points for line fitting.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.CoverageThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum acceptable proportion of edge points found along the span of a line.
member.remarks: A value of 0.5 means there are gaps, spans where edges were not detected, along fifty percent of a line. And 1.0 means a continuous edge, having no gaps, along the line.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.DistanceTolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowable distance between an edge point and a fit line.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.FeatureGradientAngleTolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowable angle difference between an edge point gradient direction and a fit line's normal.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.ExpectedLineNormalAngleTolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowable angle difference between a fit line's normal and the expected line normal.
member.value: The expected line normal angle tolerance.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.LinePolarity
member.summary: Gets or sets the polarity of a fit line along the expected line normal direction.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.MaxNumLines
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of lines to be found.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.EdgeDetectionParams
member.summary: Gets or sets the edge detection parameters.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.SearchDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction in which edge detection processes image gradients. Additionally, this value defines the nominal line normal used in the line fitting algorithm.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout, in milliseconds, for line finding.
member.remarks: If TimeoutEnabled is false then this property is ignored.
member.value: The Timeout value. The default value is 20000.0.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.exception: Thrown if set to a value less than 0.0.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.TimeoutEnabled
member.summary: Enables the timeout for line finding.
member.value: The TimeoutEnabled value. The default value is true.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder.RegionMode
member.summary: Specifies whether line finding will be performed strictly within the region or within the image aligned bounding box of the region.

remarks.para: Specifies whether line finding will be performed strictly within the confines of the region specified or within the image aligned bounding box of the region.

This property may only be set to one of the following values:
PixelAlignedBoundingBoxAdjustMask or
PixelAlignedBoundingBox.
If no Region is used then this property is ignored.

event.para: Fires when the value of this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.exception: The property is set to a value other than those specified above.

member.summary: Returns a deep copy of this class instance. Derived classes need not override this implementation. Other clients who wish to clone this instance should call ICloneable::Clone.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinder
member.summary: This class provides functionality for finding lines in images. It will return candidate lines that meet the requirements specified by its properties.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderResult.#ctor(Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderResult)
member.summary: Constructs a deep copy of the supplied CogMultiLineFinderResult instance.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderResult
member.summary: This class holds result information from a MultiLineFinder operation.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.CreateResultGraphics(Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderResultGraphicConstants)
member.summary: Creates a composite result graphic containing child graphics specified by which is a bitwise combination of CogMultiLineFinderResultGraphicConstants.
member.param:
The graphics options. Supply a value formed by ORing together one or more of the
flags.
member.returns: The CogCompositeShape which contains the requested graphics.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.NumProjectionRegions
member.summary: Gets the total number of projection regions intersected by the found line at pixels in care regions.
member.value: The number of projection regions intersected by the found line.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.EdgePoints
member.summary: Gets all contributing edge points used during the line fitting phase.
member.value: The edge points used by this result.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.MaxError
member.summary: Gets the maximum fit error (relative to the selected space of the input image) from a contributing edge point to the found line.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.RMSError
member.summary: Gets the residual RMS fit error (relative to the selected space of the input image) from the contributing edge points to the found line.
member.value: The residual root mean square fit error.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.Coverage
member.summary: Gets the proportion of spanned (care) projection regions contributing an edge point.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.Intensity
member.summary: Gets the average intensity of all contributing edge points.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.NormalizedContrast
member.summary: Gets the average normalized contrast of all contributing edge points.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.Contrast
member.summary: Gets the average absolute contrast of all contributing edge points.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.LinePolarity
member.summary: Gets the found line segment's polarity as measured from the InputImage.
member.remarks: The polarity is measured relative to the normal direction of the line segment enclosed in this result.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.FoundLine
member.summary: Gets the found line segment in the selected coordinate space of InputImage.
member.remarks: The direction of the found line segment (i.e., the direction from start point to end point) points in the same general direction as the expected line angle.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.Implementation.CogMultiLineFinderResultBase`1.ID
member.summary: Gets the unique ID used to identify this MultiLineFinder result. This ID also corresponds to the index of this result in the CogMultiLineFinderResults to which it belongs.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderEdgeDetectionParams.NormalizedContrastThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the normalized edge contrast threshold.
member.remarks: Normalized contrast is calculated by dividing the projected gradient magnitude by the projected intensity at an edge point.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderEdgeDetectionParams.ContrastThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the edge contrast threshold.
member.remarks: Contrast is calculated as the projected gradient magnitude at an edge point.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderEdgeDetectionParams.ProjectionLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the projection length in pixels.
member.remarks: The projection length affects the number of projection regions computed by the algorithm.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderEdgeDetectionParams.GradientFieldSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the gradient field size in pixels.
member.remarks: The gradient field size determines the isotropic kernel size used during Gaussian smoothing and decimation. This image processing is done prior to field projection.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderEdgeDetectionParams.Clone
member.summary: Returns a deep copy of this class instance. Derived classes that implement Clone should override this method. Other clients who wish to clone this instance should call ICloneable::Clone.

member.summary: Constructs a new instance of this class.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderEdgeDetectionParams.SfNormalizedContrastThreshold
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by NormalizedContrastThreshold may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderEdgeDetectionParams.SfContrastThreshold
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by ContrastThreshold may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderEdgeDetectionParams.SfProjectionLength
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by ProjectionLength may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderEdgeDetectionParams.SfGradientFieldSize
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by GradientFieldSize may have changed.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderEdgeDetectionParams
member.summary: Class for configuring the edge detection behavior of CogMultiLineFinder.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordDiagConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of diagnostic data that can be included in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordDiagConstants.All
member.summary: Include all of the diagnostic data in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordDiagConstants.UnconsideredOutliers
member.summary: Include graphics for edge points not considered for line fitting in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordDiagConstants.ConsideredOutliers
member.summary: Include graphics for edge points considered for line fitting, but ultimately not used, in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordDiagConstants.InputImageMask
member.summary: Include a copy of the input image mask in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordDiagConstants.Region
member.summary: Include a copy of the region in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordDiagConstants.InputImageDeepCopy
member.summary: Include a deep copy of the input image in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordDiagConstants.InputImageByReference
member.summary: Include a reference to the input image in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordDiagConstants.None
member.summary: Do not include any of the diagnostic data in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of result data that can be included in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordConstants.All
member.summary: Include all of the non-diagnostic data in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordConstants.Inliers
member.summary: Include graphics for the edge points used by a result in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordConstants.FoundLines
member.summary: Include the found lines in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLastRunRecordConstants.None
member.summary: Do not include any of the non-diagnostic data in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderCurrentRecordConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of data that can be included in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderCurrentRecordConstants.All
member.summary: Include all possible records in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderCurrentRecordConstants.InputImageMask
member.summary: Include the input image mask in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderCurrentRecordConstants.Region
member.summary: Include the interactive region in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderCurrentRecordConstants.InputImage
member.summary: Include the input image in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderCurrentRecordConstants.None
member.summary: Do not include any records in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderResultGraphicConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of flags used for creating CogMultiLineFinder result graphics.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderResultGraphicConstants.All
member.summary: Draw all result graphics.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderResultGraphicConstants.TipText
member.summary: Turn on tip text for result graphics.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderResultGraphicConstants.Inliers
member.summary: Draw the edge points for this result.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderResultGraphicConstants.FoundLine
member.summary: Draw the found line for this result.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderResultGraphicConstants.None
member.summary: Draw no result graphics.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLinePolarityConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of line polarity values.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLinePolarityConstants.Mixed
member.summary: Both dark-to-light and light-to-dark transitions are allowed at different portions of the same line segment.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLinePolarityConstants.Either
member.summary: The brightness transitions either from dark to light or from light to dark.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLinePolarityConstants.LightToDark
member.summary: The brightness transitions from light to dark, relative to line normal direction.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLinePolarityConstants.DarkToLight
member.summary: The brightness transitions from dark to light, relative to line normal direction.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLineFittingModeConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of modes for fitting lines to edge points.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLineFittingModeConstants.RANSAC
member.summary: Random Sample Consensus is used to select edge point combinations evaluated for line fitting.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.MultiLineFinder.CogMultiLineFinderLineFittingModeConstants.Exhaustive
member.summary: All edge point combinations are evaluated for line fitting.
